Feedback? We'd be happy to discuss it.
Read our story, how we started.

q.1: What coin is used for NFTs?
q.2: What wallet do I need to mint, buy and collect?
q.4: How I can trade KSM for my artwork?
q.5: How I can buy KSM as new-comer?
q.6: How I can buy KSM with ETH, DAI, BTC..?
q.7: What's the flow when I'm NFT creator?
q.8: Can I use this in virtual worlds?
q.9: I've got errors, how to resolve them?
q.10: What does SEND, CONSUME, LIST mean?
q.11: I've minted NFT, but I don't see it in gallery, where is it?
q.13: How I will sell my token?
q.15: How I can create own shop?
q.19: Will you have AR/VR mode or implementation?
q.21: How do I update metadata for extension?
q.24: Is there an official KodaDot token?

1.m: @.md:faq.a.1.l1 You can get it through our @.md:faq.a.1.l2 feature or @.md:faq.a.1.l3

2.m: We reccommend you to use @.md:faq.a.2.l1 for now. Later we plan to add mobile-first experience. In all cases, backup your seed, it's your owners right and sort of value.

3.m: You will go to the @.md:faq.a.3.l1 You need to first mint your Collection and then Token. If you want to video that, DM us!

4.m: Its supported widely on popular exchanges. At time of writing this FAQ, 2nd February, daily liqudity on exchanges is around $200M at time of writing and 1 $KSM is traded for ~ $100. @.md:faq.a.4.l1

5.m: We have integration with @.md:faq.a.5.l1, click on @.md:faq.a.1.l2 in navbar. You can use Revolut, Manual bank transfer, Debit Card and Apple Pay to top-up your KSM address. You can @.md:faq.a.5.l2

6.m: For best rates, you can @.md:faq.a.6.l1 For best experience @.md:faq.a.6.l2 If you are @.md:faq.a.6.l3

7.m: First of all, you need to install @.md:faq.a.2.l1, backup your seed. Then you top up your wallet address through our @.md:faq.a.1.l2 feature. Once you have funds, head to @.md:faq.a.3.l1, create Collection. Wait till Collection is minted, then you go to @.md:faq.a.7.l1 and Mint your very first token! If you had issues, we are working on our UX-flow. KodaDot has around month old code and there is still room to improve, bear with us, we are just team of two. Happy Minting ðŸ˜Œ

8.m: We are exploring possibilities, we actually plan to actively research on this in our milestone 2

9.m: We are trying delivering incremental updates on daily basis & fixes ASAP. We may published new version and your browser has cached old one. If you are on Windows, try hold down Ctrl and then press F5. Mac users, hold down CMD and Shift and then press R. If this did not help, DMs on Twitter with screenshot where is developer console open.

10.m: SEND will send it to someone, CONSUME will burn it, LIST will list it for sale so someone can buy it from you.

11.m: Best way is to check through @.md:faq.a.11.l1 and lookup your address. @.md:faq.a.11.l2
11.l2: [You can find example how minted NFT looks through explorer, when you look on extrinsics.](@.common:links.kusama_scanner.extrinsic.href)

12.m: Right now, we are aware that US is not supported, other all countries should work, @.md:faq.a.12.l1 This is out of our control right now.

13.m: Right now, you will use LIST in Actions.

14.m: Right now, we don't have chain logic, but we plan to implement something great, soon. @.md:faq.a.14.l1

15.m: We are implementing collection view, sets of collection view. @.md:faq.a.14.l1

16.m: It's that heart ðŸ–¤ under NFT token. We are @.md:faq.a.16.l1 which works like appreciations. It's function is price discovery for your work.

17.m: Right now, we have @.md:faq.a.17.l1 We are actively looking for funding options, eventually we would raise private funds. DMs us, if you are interested into private sale.

18.m: We have only private channel for NFT creators, DM us if you are NFT creator!

19.m: Yes, that's part of our Milestone 2, stay tuned!

20.m: If you are on Mac, on Chrome hit Option, CMD, J, Firefox Command + Option + K.

21.m: Go to @.md:faq.a.21.l1 and see there button Update metadata, then refresh your window, should be working with recent chain types

22.m: Check if you have transferable $KSM on your account, not staked. That's different. You can check it at @.md:faq.a.22.l1 and at balances unfold, you can see there Transferable amount.

24.m: No, there is no official token launched. Please follow official social media and be aware of scam and phissing attempts from unofficial sources. DYOR.

mint.unlimited: Unlimited items in in your collection
mint.command: List of commands for mass mint

expert.countGlitch: You have more adresses than available editions. This can cause a problem. Consider to set EDITION field to at least to {0}
expert.postfix: Add hashtag and index after the name (e.g #1)

name.label: Collection name
name.message: Name of your collection. It will be visible in the gallery

description.label: Collection description
description.message: Description of your collection. Markdown is supported

symbol.label: Symbol (short name)
symbol.message: The symbol which is attributed to the NFT: for an example, Kusama is labeled as KSM

name.label: name
name.message: Name of your NFT. It will be visible in the gallery

description.label: NFT description
description.message: Description of your NFT. Markdown is supported

tooltip.symbol: The symbol which is attributed to the NFT: for an example, Kusama is labeled as KSM
tooltip.name: NFT will be visible under this name in gallery

subsocial.noComment: There are currently no comments for this post!
subsocial.faucet: You have no funds. Click here to visit faucet
subsocial.logIn: You have to be logged in to vote and comment.
subsocial.post: Post NFT to Subsocial to enable comments
subsocial.autoFaucet: Click to obtain SUB from faucet

termOfService.accept: I confirm that I hold full copyright ownership of the submitted digital asset (or have sufficient permission by the owner to use the asset)

series.title: Top Collection
series.subtitle: The top NFTs on RMRK, ranked by volume, floor price and other statistics.

helper.noInfinityCollections: You have no collections with unlimited NFTs
helper.indexerReadOnly: App is in read only mode, try reload app or visit Discord

basic.title: Basic mass mint
basic.description: This is the basic mass mint, it will create NFTs with the same symbol and name, but different amount. It will also create different amount of NFTs with the same symbol and name, but different amount.

range.title: Mass mint range
range.description: You can specify the range of the mass mint, it will create NFTs with the same symbol and name, but different amount. It will also create different amount of NFTs with the same symbol and name, but different amount.

all.title: Mass mint all
all.description: You can specify the range of the mass mint, it will create NFTs with the same symbol and name, but different amount. It will also create different amount of NFTs with the same symbol and name, but different amount.

syntax.name: Name of the NFT (e.g Awesome Token)
syntax.description: Mutliline description of the token (e.g This is an awesome token)
syntax.all: Apply to all tokens (use three dots: ...)
